item.title: Comment on USA fact of the day by Crusader
item.description:
I wonder if this is actually a result of a positive underlying change or more just that there’s X number of people in the US highly likely to die if a potent drug comes to the market (eg Fentanyl) and the majority of them have tragically already died. It’s not as if there’s a gargantuan stream of new addicts every year.
